### Title (English): 
16 Foot V-Hull Utility Boats with Outboard Motor and Trailer

### Title (French):
Bateaux de Travail de 16 Pieds à Coque en V, avec Moteur Hors-Bord et Remorque

### Reference Number:
CB-284-34227054

### Solicitation Number:
M500-24-1327/A

### Announcement Details

* **Publication Date:** 28 December 2023
* **Tender Closing Date:** 24 January 2024, 15:00:00
* **Expected Contract Start Date:** 15 February 2024
* **Expected Contract End Date:** 20 February 2024

### Delivery Locations

* **Canada**

### Contracting Entity Details

* **Entity Name:** Royal Canadian Mounted Police (RCMP)
* **Address:** 10065 Jasper Ave, Edmonton, Alberta, T5J 3B1, Canada

### Notice Details

* **Notice Type:** Request for Proposal
* **Procurement Category:** Government Division (GD)
* **Procurement Method:** Competitive - Open Bidding

### Tender Requirements

The RCMP is seeking proposals for the supply of four (4) aluminum, 16-foot V-hull utility boats, each equipped with an outboard motor and trailer. Two boats will be delivered to Regina, and two boats will be delivered to Winnipeg. The primary function of these boats will be to support police operations, including patrols, interdictions, transport of personnel, and search and rescue.

The Government of Canada reserves the right to exercise the option to purchase an additional boat as detailed in Article 4 of Annex A.

### Selection Criteria

* The primary criterion for contract award is the lowest evaluated price.
* Tenders must comply with all requirements outlined in the bid solicitation to be considered responsive.

### Tender Submission

Tenders must be submitted electronically to the RCMP Bid Receiving Unit at NWR_Procurement_Bids@rcmp-grc.gc.ca. The closing date for tender submission is 24 January 2024.

### Important Documents

Please refer to the attached tender documents for further information. The Crown retains the right to negotiate with any supplier on any procurement. The contracting entity has adopted the Integrity Regime administered by Public Services and Procurement Canada. Procurement documents are available for download through the Government Electronic Tendering Service (GETS) at http://www.buyandsell.gc.ca/tenders.
